PrecisCERTAIN FORMER EMPLOYEES OF SDL OPTICS, INC. REMISSION ORDER - which provides for the remission of some or all of the income tax and interest paid or payable by forty-two taxpayers in respect of shares acquired in the years 1999 and 2000 through an employee stock purchase plan.
